channel.title: CVE Feed for BUFFALO INC. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BUFFALO INC. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2016-7826|2024-08-06T02:04:56.025Z -- buffalo%20inc. -- wnc01wh
item.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in Buffalo WNC01WH devices with firmware version 1.0.0.8 and earlier allows authenticated attackers to read arbitrary files via specially crafted POST requests.

item.title: CVE-2016-7824|2024-08-06T02:04:56.104Z -- buffalo%20inc. -- wnc01wh
item.description: Buffalo NC01WH devices with firmware version 1.0.0.8 and earlier allows authenticated attackers to bypass access restriction to enable the debug option via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2016-7822|2024-08-06T02:04:56.103Z -- buffalo%20inc. -- wnc01wh
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Buffalo WNC01WH devices with firmware version 1.0.0.8 and earlier allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of a logged in user to perform unintended operations via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2016-7825|2024-08-06T02:04:56.054Z -- buffalo%20inc. -- wnc01wh
item.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in Buffalo WNC01WH devices with firmware version 1.0.0.8 and earlier allows authenticated attackers to read arbitrary files via specially crafted commands.

item.title: CVE-2016-7821|2024-08-06T02:04:56.024Z -- buffalo%20inc. -- wnc01wh
item.description: Buffalo WNC01WH devices with firmware version 1.0.0.8 and earlier allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service against the management screen via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2016-7823|2024-08-06T02:04:56.055Z -- buffalo%20inc. -- wnc01wh
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Buffalo WNC01WH devices with firmware version 1.0.0.8 and earlier allows authenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-26023|2024-07-15T16:10:17.826Z -- buffalo%20inc. -- wcr-1166ds
item.description: OS command injection vulnerability in BUFFALO wireless LAN routers allows a logged-in user to execute arbitrary OS commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-26023|2024-04-15T10:51:04.093Z -- buffalo%20inc. -- wcr-1166ds
item.description: OS command injection vulnerability in BUFFALO wireless LAN routers allows a logged-in user to execute arbitrary OS commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-23486|2024-04-15T10:50:01.778Z -- buffalo%20inc. -- wsr-2533dhp
item.description: Plaintext storage of a password issue exists in BUFFALO wireless LAN routers, which may allow a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker with access to the product's login page may obtain configured credentials.

item.title: CVE-2024-23486|2024-07-05T15:05:31.047Z -- buffalo%20inc. -- wsr-2533dhp
item.description: Plaintext storage of a password issue exists in BUFFALO wireless LAN routers, which may allow a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker with access to the product's login page may obtain configured credentials.
